ChangeList.Description: Added the [personDataSource](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personDataSource?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [yomiPersonName](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/yomiPersonName?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [personAnniversary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personAnniversary?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the **anniversaryType** enumeration type.
Removed the **anniversaries** relationship from the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profile?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **source** property in the [itemFacet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemFacet?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **isSearchable** property from the [itemFacet](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemFacet?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **personDataSources** resource type.
Changed the **displayName** property in the [personName](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personName?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Changed the **first** property in the [personName](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personName?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Changed the **last** property in the [personName](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personName?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Changed the type of the **pronunciation** property in the [personName](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personName?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **personNamePronounciation** resource type.
Changed the type of the **activities** property in the [educationalActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationalActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **awards** property in the [educationalActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationalActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **fieldsOfStudy** property in the [educationalActivityDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationalActivityDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the **tag** property in the [languageProficiency](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/languageProficiency?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [languageProficiency](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/languageProficiency?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **personAnnualEvent** resource type.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [personInterest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personInterest?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [personAnnotation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personAnnotation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [personResponsibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personResponsibility?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [projectParticipation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/projectParticipation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the **company** property in the [positionDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/positionDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Changed the **jobTitle** property in the [positionDetail](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/positionDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [skillProficiency](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/skillProficiency?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [webAccount](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/webAccount?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **thumbnailUrl** property from the [personWebsite](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/personWebsite?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **personExtension** resource type.
Changed the **id** property in the [extension](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/extension?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Removed the **translationPreferences** property from the [regionalAndLanguageSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/regionalAndLanguageSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **translationLanguageOverride** resource type.
Removed the **translationPreferences** resource type.
Removed the **personAnnualEventType** enumeration type.
Removed the **translationBehavior** enumeration type.
Removed the **photo** relationship from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **photos** relationship from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
